headline: Ken Jacobs, Visionary Experimental Filmmaker, Is Dead at 92

headline: Alex Garland Pairs With a Veteran to Engage in Realistic ‘Warfare’

headline: Souleymane Cissé, Celebrated Malian Filmmaker, Dies at 84
